import React from "react" import Selector from "./Selector.js"; import configValues from "../config.js" class ParentHomebriding extends React.Component { state = { student: {}, hours: 15 } // TODO: make the properties in DB and props name match componentDidMount() { fetch('/api/singleStudent', { method: 'POST', headers: new Headers({ 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }), body: JSON.stringify({ studentId: this.props.studentId }) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(student => this.setState({ student })) } setMinutes() { this.setState({ hours: (document.querySelector("#homebridingTime").value / 60) }) } updateHours() { fetch('api/singleStudent', { method: 'PUT', headers: new Headers({ 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }), body: JSON.stringify({ studentId: this.props.studentId, hoursUpdate: this.state.hours }) }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(student => this.setState({student})) } render() { return (


Example Student's homebriding Database


{this.state.student.fname + " " + this.state.student.lname} has earned {this.state.student.totalHours}/320 hours so far!

There are X days remaining until the next quarter of homebriding hours

Log hours:

this.setMinutes()} />
) } } export default ParentHomebriding
